lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: If we all join together, a little at a time, we can make a huge difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: Retired. As a woman who worked in a "mans" area of employment I refer to myself as a "pink" collar worker.

lender.name: Alexa
lender.loan_because: I want to spread goodwill from my country to others that are less privileged. I have no reservations about sacrificing a little bit of my money to help responsible entrepreneurs improve the quality of their own lives and communities.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I realize how lucky I am to have always had help when I needed it and want to let others feel that support.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It is nice to see someone improve their situation. Everyone should have opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to improve their English so that they can communicate with foreigners.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: in the words of the great Dr. Seuss, "UNLESS someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It's not."
lender.occupational_info: I assist little children and beginners getting on and off a snow ski lift. I also teach adaptive skiing in my spare time.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: one person can make a difference... one step at a time.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: Everyone can make a difference in the world.... no matter how small.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I've gotta help the little guy.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student studying to become a pastor, with the hope of being there for people during the toughest and best times of their lives. I'm also working with the group Christians Committed to Human Rights, which is a pretty sweet deal if you ask me.

lender.name: Clearwater REI, LLC
lender.loan_because:
The boldness to believe that our business can change the world both locally and globally.
We choose to live in gratitude of the abundance we have been given and commit to sharing that with others.
lender.occupational_info: CLEARWATER Real Estate Investments, a full service real estate investment company, provides a broad spectrum of alternative investments to accredited investors offering both equity and debt direct participation programs.

lender.name: Erin
lender.occupational_info: I study painting and drawing at the oldest art school in Australia.

lender.name: Nicki
lender.occupational_info: I freelance as a graphic and web designer.

lender.name: natalie
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much in my life and I couldn't have done it without others... I want to help others as I have been helped.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a teacher and I also work part time on a farm.

lender.name: Susie
lender.occupational_info: Having my own business I understand the challenges. Always keep your head up, smile and know with You Can Do It!

lender.name: Fred & Jennifer
lender.loan_because: We want to teach our son to be part of the global community, to teach him the importance of giving and to learn the value of helping others achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Pauline
lender.loan_because: Giving someone the opportunity to end the circle of poverty with a micro loan - it is so simple yet effective
lender.occupational_info: President of The Asha Foundation Inc. Registered charity in Australia helping the people of Nepal have a sustainable future by providing housing and education

lender.name: Lotta
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: JUDY
lender.loan_because: What goes around comes around...
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired, but I previously worked in human resources and medical and business management.

lender.name: Noah
lender.loan_because: It's an increddible opportunity to so easily help people that want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am finishing up school and doing some job searching. One goal is to work in a marketing/sales environment for an alternative energy corporation.

lender.name: Hannam University
lender.occupational_info: Staff of University In Korea.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want to improve the lives of my fellow human beings.
lender.occupational_info: I help design the look and message of a marketing campaign.

lender.name: RAP
lender.loan_because: Nothing brings more joy than helping people in need!
lender.occupational_info: OUR MUSIC INSPIRES US TO HELP EACH OTHER.

lender.name: Maria
lender.occupation: Single Mother & Small home business owner
lender.loan_because: We all need help once in a while. Today I am blessed with good health and good prospects and I am in a position to help in a small way. I live in the best country in the world and I like to help those with the spirit to try and make their lives better. I admire the tenacity and ingenuity evident in the many faces I see on KIVA. They are inspiring. The lenders too are inspiring, varied as the applicants it is a joy to be a part of this great organisation.
lender.occupational_info: I am taking a nursing refresher course at the moment. Something we have to do if we have not practices for more than six years. Although I did work overseas it was casual and not enough to count so it was back to the books fo me. Not a bad thing but just a slow process. Sometimes I feel like I will never get through it. I had fully expected to have to pay for my studies but I was lucky to be granted the entire cost by our provincial government in Alberta. There are not many people who have this privilege. I look at some of the people on KIVA and know that but for my privilege of birth and circumstance I too could be in their situation. I do a little volunteering in the arts here in the city.

lender.name: Sandra, Pam and Debbi
lender.loan_because: thru here we are able to help, where otherwise we could not.
lender.occupational_info: Administration and Social Secretaries!

lender.name: BENJAMIN KARIUKI WAWERU
lender.loan_because:
Dear kiva, I am realy intrested having a lone towards your micro-finance ,i run a hostel that has accapacity of 65 students i cook for them breakfast,lunch and supper the food cost is quiet high hear in kenya i need to buy my dry goods in bulk so that i can cut down my food cost ever month/my rent fee .All in all i need about $2500 loan repaid back.
yours faithfully; Benjamin kariuki waweru, cell 0726757164 thank you sir/madam
lender.occupational_info: i run a Hostel for catering university students hear in nakuru county/KENYA . The hostels name is called Joy hostel we offer; 1.Rooms 2.Security 3.Water 4.Cleanliness 5.Meals 6.Entertainment

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because:
With redistributing a bit of wealth to people who really need it, the world will be a better place.
Currently I am cycling from Alaska to Argentina, see http://WorldOnaBike.com for images and reports.
My website www.ExposedPlanet.com is a so-called photoblog, which is the visual variation of a blog.
I have started ExposedPlanet.com not only as a way to show my portfolio, but also to share the beauty of our planet and its people. Nowadays negative press & media might make people scared of everything foreign or different: culture, religion, people and the places themselves. This xenophobia is taking over our lives and prevents us from seeing the real world as it is: a wonderful place with beautiful people.
There are no bad or evil countries, religions or people. There is bad and good people in every culture, including your own.
I hope I can share a bit of the amazement I have enjoyed while traveling the 7 continents. The more I see, the more I know I still have to see and I will. Life is too short to focus on not-existing enemies & fears.
I also started www.biketravellers.com, where cyclists can open a weblog. If more people use their bicycle, the earth will e a bit greener, and as we will be less dependent on oil, safer too...
lender.occupational_info:
I am a photographer, writer and organizer of mountain climbing expeditions. I have had the luck to travel on all continents and meet people all over the world.
Much time I spent behind my computer, creating my websites, answering emails and organizing logistics, writing and editing photograps. The rest of the time, I am travelling, either for work or out of curiosity or for the experience of travelling on a bicycle :)

lender.name: ivan
lender.loan_because: To Help
lender.occupational_info: Bathroom Accessories

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: I can afford to
lender.occupational_info: I have work at the moment

lender.name: Boyana
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to create a better future for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I do research on how businesses collaborate to improve the efficiency and quality of their products.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I work in musical theater in the Netherlands, creating musicals as either the director, the choreographer or both.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: A loan gives a person more self respect and incentive than a gift.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: Someone, somewhere can always use help with something.....

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: God calls us to care for the sick, the poor and those in prison.
lender.occupational_info: I stay home with my two kids and raise them in a way that will glorify God! I support my husband so he can also glorify God through his job! I take care of our home.

lender.name: Mandy
lender.loan_because: I was blessed in this life with a wonderful family and everything a person could ever need. We are all one people on this earth and it is our responsibility to share with others the wealth that we have been blessed with.

lender.name: katherine
lender.loan_because: This is one of those perfect ideas, I am honored to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional cook.

lender.name: Mimi
lender.loan_because:
As a citizen of the world who lives in a developed country I strongly believe we all owe it to help our fellow human beings who unfairly, through mere circumstance get by with so much less ...
Capitalism, Imperialism together with religious dogma has held back humanity, science and progress for far too long. We can and must reverse this trend and increase equity around the world, as without this humanity will continue to be plagued by poverty and injustice. Let's get back to our intrinsic humanistic principles and create a world in which all humans have equal universal rights to peace, a decent living standard, free health care, free education and happiness.
Please watch : The Empathic Civilisation - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l7AWnfFRc7g
I wish I could do so much more ... but sincerely hope my small contribution really makes a difference :)

lender.name: Glenda
lender.loan_because: I believe in a better world. And I want to be apart of it!
lender.occupational_info: My job is to teach English. I love being a teacher. To see the children learn what I have teached them makes my life and career a dream came true.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: it reinforces the belief that a little bit of goodwill can impact another's life.
lender.occupational_info: I assist technology entrepreneurs to develop a plan, start and grow their business. I then help them to find capital to execute that plan.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: 1) Life is what you make it 2) Everyone deserves a chance 3) To give hope
lender.occupational_info: "I know in my heart that man is good. That what is right will always eventually triumph. And there's purpose and worth to each and every life." -Ronald Reagan

lender.name: James Cryan
lender.occupation: Teach for Ameria Teacher - Middle School English
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I try to make sure the children are well.

lender.name: debbie
lender.loan_because: I would like to see social and economic justice for everyone. Also my 5th and 6 th grade students are helping with the loan.

lender.name: ege
lender.loan_because: "We will have to repent in this generation not merely for the hateful words and actions of the bad people but for the appalling silence of the good people." — Martin Luther King, Jr.

lender.name: Denise's Pebbles
lender.loan_because: to help make a difference in some way
lender.occupational_info: I work in a flower shop and design arrangements for all occasions & process flowers

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: I have done well for myself, and like to help others work their way up too.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs for the big IBM computers that corporations use.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to feel connected in a positive, meaningful way to people in other parts of the world. Also, to learn. To remind myself. To celebrate striving & achievement.
lender.occupational_info: I help people dream up & build things for the Web.

lender.name: Sunny
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand sometimes, this is a great way for people to help themselves ultimately and not feel they are receiving charity, just a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I sell software to large companies for as much as I can! I have four kids of various ages who keep me and my wife very busy. My parents were immigrants to the UK, with very little when they arrived. They were shown much hospitality and given help, and this is a way for me to give back in their memory too.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: one person can make a difference no matter where you live on this beautiful planet.
lender.occupational_info: I use to teach eight and nine year olds.

lender.name: Jane and Brian
lender.loan_because: We are blessed!

lender.name: Rekiya
lender.loan_because: It's an awesome and caring thing to do for those who are less fortunate than I am.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have a good education and much opportunity. Helping others achieve that same is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I design roads in the metropolitan Detroit area of Michigan in the USA.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I like to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a prison to help prevent inmates from escaping and to help prevent them from hurting other inmates and staff.

lender.name: banana bread
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to

lender.occupational_info: A security director in Washington D.C.

lender.occupational_info: i make the online banking experience easier for customers

lender.loan_because: we are so blessed...

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a happy productive life

lender.name: Karen Perez
lender.loan_because: I feel so blessed, and it is great to be able to share with people less fortunate. It is a wonderful thing to be able to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I can! And it feels sooo good.

lender.name: Wes
lender.loan_because: I believe the oppotunity to accomplish a goal is one of the fundamental rights of all human beings and that achieving a goal is one of the most satisfying rewards of living.
lender.occupational_info: I feed the world.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Job
lender.loan_because: I think it can help people build up their business
lender.occupational_info: I study economics

lender.name: Geo Chen
lender.loan_because: I have a responsibility to give back to others by donating and loaning money to worthy causes and less fortunate people. I hope my money can be used to create a positive and self-sustaining impact on the world.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell foreign currency and try to make a profit when one appreciates against the other.

lender.name: WSIB Management Team
lender.loan_because: we really believe that making people independent is a great way to give!
lender.occupational_info: We try and make sure that the companies where people work are healthy and safe.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: It´s payback time for us in the privileged part of the world and this way it can be done over and over again!

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I think this is such a great program. I want these entrepreneurs to succeed!!

lender.name: Ozzie & Family
lender.loan_because: It feels great to be able to help!
lender.occupational_info: We are a family of students and travelers. We hope to visit many of the countries which Kiva highlights.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe in the individual's ability to create change in the world...
lender.occupational_info: I run a business called The Spiral Tree - a place of learning and insight, discovery and growth and the doorway to life-enhancing courses, events, newsletters and creative musings...

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: We have so much in the USA...And In so many instances things are just handed to us....There are so many people around the world who have nothing at all but the desire for freedom and the willingness to work hard and take controll of their own destiny.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Realtor, I help people to buy and sell homes for their families to live in and for investing with .

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I think its important to give people an opportunity to improve their lives and develop the community in which they live.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance to work for themselves and pursue their dreams. And in the ability of people to achieve when unrestricted.
lender.occupational_info: Development of Real Estate Projects that satisfy investors, communities, and participants.

lender.name: Jones Family
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is what it's all about.

lender.name: Share Networking
lender.loan_because:
Most of the money in the world is in the hand of the rich Western countries. KIVA is an excellent way of redistribution money to the places where it's needed most. No matter how much money we have in the West, we can always temporarily miss $ 25.00 or more.
The examples on Kiva show what great a difference we can make with only little money (according to Western standards).
I am proud to be able to assist others in setting up their business, while I am succeeding in mine.
lender.occupational_info:
Importer of consumer goods from China.
Textiles, electronics, printed matters, toys

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference in the lives of those who need a little help.

lender.name: Lara & Tom
lender.loan_because: This is a way people can really make a difference even if contributing just a little.
lender.occupational_info: I give pet dogs haircuts and clean them up.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee all the functions of my hotel, operations, food and beverage, guest rooms, sales and accounting.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: it's important be generous in prosperity and grateful in adversity. :-)
lender.occupational_info: O Thou kind Lord! Unite all. Let the religions agree and make the nations one, so that they may see each other as one family and the whole earth as one home. May they all live together in perfect harmony. - prayer from the Baha'i Faith.

lender.name: Jeannette de Beauvoir
lender.loan_because: it enables me to participate in helping other women find economic independence and well-bring. I'm very grateful for the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a content consultant and provide commercial/business writing services. I am also, personally, a published novelist and produced playwright.

lender.name: Peta
lender.loan_because: I have excess $ at present and believe we should share it around... my good fortune could also be someone else's. Pay it forward!!
lender.occupational_info: I educate others about science and the environment. I also practice what I preach and live with a low ecological footprint so that we can all (humans and all other organisms) live on this planet.

lender.name: Ela
lender.loan_because: I want more chances for all people on earth!

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I need to help people more. I value the entrepreneurial spirit. I sell a natural product that removes toxins. check it out.
lender.occupational_info: I value real estate for loan purposes. I sell health and anti-aging products.

lender.name: Darren & Anahi
lender.loan_because: we loan because we are fortunate enough to do so

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: Giving and caring is a priviledge and an honor , I yearn to do what is good and right for my global family. Blessings to all.
lender.occupational_info: I strive to assist pre-schoolers with their language and communication skills through play . I love being with children , they are all little miracles.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am six years old and help on my mom and dad's farm in Indiana. We grow corn and soybeans. I have chickens and sell the eggs. I save up some money to buy a toy and the rest I give away. I like picking people to help on Kiva who live far away and like to farm too. (As told to John's mom since he can't type yet...)

lender.name: Ana Q
lender.occupational_info: i teach young people

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: The Joseph Family
lender.loan_because: We all need a helping hand sometimes!

lender.name: Rebecca Sergi
lender.loan_because: I believe that I will make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I love helping people who I come in direct contact with in my life. I get the most reward out of helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: we are brothers and sisters
lender.occupational_info: I supervise a master control room for a public television station.

lender.name: Bobbie
lender.loan_because: I want to be the change that I believe God Jesus wants to see in the world. It starts with me
lender.occupational_info: I just feel that too many people think if they don't give alot at one time it will not help, I don't believe that at all! Any amount can help I love you all with the Love Of Jesus! Pray for me as I continue to pray for you.

lender.name: Bushra
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much, and it doesn't mean anything if I don't share it with those in need.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: A small amount of capital can make a huge difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies raise capital

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed and am excited and enriched to be a part of a program that allows us all to share in the success of hard working men and women who, like me, desire a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Work in computer development as liaison between the developers who write computer programs for our finance department and the accounting staff making the programming request..

lender.name: The Wilder Family
lender.loan_because: We want to see hard working people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: My husband works with airplanes and I work from home while caring for our two children.

lender.name: Douglas R. Hall III
lender.loan_because: If I were in the shoes of any one of these people, I would want the chance to succeed. As I am a member of the lucky few who live in the richest countrty on the planet, I feel I should do the best I can to help those less lucky than I. I would hope others would do the same for me.
lender.occupational_info: I did belong to a public high school where my books, food and tuition were all free. I am very privleged to have done so. You can go to www.twitter.com/DouglasRHall3 to find out what I am doing every day.

lender.name: Kymberly
lender.loan_because: I am currently a waitress, student and a mom. I am fortunate enough to make a enough money for me and my son and still have a little extra to give someone else a chance at getting ahead.
lender.occupational_info: You meet new people, it can be very stressful yet very fulfilling. I go home with money in my pocket everynight..It is going to help me get through nursing school.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: To whom much has been received, much will be given.
lender.occupational_info: I was a teacher and helped handicapped children in my work.

lender.name: Aruna & Lorne
lender.occupation: Overseas Medical Svcs., Management & Research Work
lender.loan_because: We are firm believers that 'little drops of water make a mighty ocean'. This is a great way to help the hard-working needy people in developing & under-developed countries. When compared to the lesser privileged people in many countries, we are very blessed with more than what we need in every aspect of our lives which makes us want to pay our taxes to humanity too.
lender.occupational_info: We are innovative-health care providers to patients from across the globe.

lender.name: Lyse
lender.loan_because: There is so many people around the would that did not have a chance in life and I would like to encourage them in doing better for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I was caring for passengers at high altitude. Now I like to care for people on the ground.

lender.name: Joselyn
lender.loan_because: I want to make as much difference in other peoples lives as I can. When it takes so little to help, why not....

lender.name: Sheryl, Bob & Tucker
lender.loan_because: We're particularly blessed in this life!

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because: I want to help others improve their life
lender.occupational_info: I like my work. I work in an office and I am very good at it. I do the financial part in the calculation and payment of periodical benefits for victims of the second world war. I find it important to support myself financially.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I hope that whatever small gestures I can make will enable someone else to realize her (or his) dreams. I hope this will enhance someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: In my work, I try to help other people to overcome obstacles. I try to support people so that they will have the courage to keep going. I try to help people who are struggling to live a little bit easier. I try to help people see that someone cares about them.

lender.name: Fiber Optic Cable Shop
lender.loan_because: We would love to be there to help these individuals personally, but since that is impractical, Kiva is an outstanding alternative.
lender.occupational_info: We manufacturer and distribute fiber optic products for data communications.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: A small gesture on my part can make a huge difference to someone else. Pay it forward!

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that the faculty and staff in my department have computer equipment that is up to date and working. I work at a University and support two departments. The Germanic and Slavic Studies department offers courses in German and Russian. The Comparative Literature Department houses a variety of languages including Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and Swahili.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: I've always had people in my life to help me if i needed it. Now i want to give back.

lender.name: Jean Francois
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that helping people become independent and self sufficient is crucial to alleviating both hunger and poverty. It also promotes, confidence and a thirst for knowledge.

lender.name: Patrick - Pamela
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in a life every day.
lender.occupational_info: Project manager.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: With small tokens of generosity and faith, we can impact the world in a monumental way.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted to make a difference in other people's lives. Staying at home with three kids under age 4 doesn't provide a lot of opportunites to do so. I read about Kiva in a Parents magazine and couldn't wait to check it out.

lender.name: Aileen
lender.loan_because: I want to help and connect with others. We have so much even when we struggle it is nothing compared to these people. They are smart and hard workers and just need some help.
lender.occupational_info: I review medical procedures that need to be done to make sure they are medically necessary. I approved medical equipment and therapy also

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: although I am far from wealthy I can help someone who can do so much with what seems a small amount from me but can really impact their life so much
lender.occupational_info: I work at the front reception desk of an International Wire & Cable company, I am the first person seen by vendors and visitors. It is my job to get them to the right person as smoothly and pleasantly as possible.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help people across the world achieve their goals and to be to be self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info:
I live in Canada with my husband and 9 month old baby girl. I speak English, Spanish and French. In my spare time I volunteer with a local charity that helps African refugees from war torn countries settle in Canada. I would like to dedicate more of my time and efforts to help those in need around the world.
Je suis Canadienne et j'habite en Vancouver. Je veux aider les femmes autours du monde avec leurs reves.
Soy Canadiense y quiero ayudar a las mujeres del mundo con sus metas para que pueden mantener a sus familias y tener la confianza de hacer algo con si misma.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: As someone once said, "While we do not live by bread alone, we don't live long without it." The Kiva program is a good way to help others help themselves and express solidarity with our neighbors around the world.
lender.occupational_info: As a minister it is my privilege to help others grow in faith, hope, and love. I have often been inspired in my own faith journey by others near and far.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of two boys under 3...its hard, demanding and 24-7.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: making a better world starts with yourself
lender.occupational_info: Owner of a cleaningcompany for specialized cleaning. I knows by experience how hard it can be starting your own business.

lender.name: Heloise
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to start or expand a viable business in order to earn their living and serve their neighbors.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the oil and gas exploration and production industry, as a geophysicist. I examine seismic reflection field data in order to learn of structure, stratigraphy, fractures, and in situ stress at depth in the rocks. Renewable energy (solar, wind, wave) are better sources of energy than fossil fuels, and I seek to shift my life off hydrocarbons and onto renewable energy !

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I like to see (especially) women empowered to do well in business. We have it so good in America, but everyone deserves a chance to thrive and become sucessful.
lender.occupational_info: Writing and editing in the law field.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: It's amazing how much we have, when compared to people who have so little and request so little. How can we not help?
lender.occupational_info: We manufacture windshield repair equipment to people all over the world, helping them get started in business.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I feel priviledged to be able to help other people around the world trying to make a better life for themselves and their families
lender.occupational_info: I analyze financial documents for an insurance company in Phoenix AZ

lender.name: Johna
lender.loan_because: God wants me to.
lender.occupational_info: We build shopping centers and also apartments to live in.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: we have a small business & want to help support others & gain independence!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a sales mgr at a local retail store & my husband is a small business owner/self employee in construction & estimating.

lender.name: Simone
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful way to support people in need with the necessary initiative to build a business

lender.name: Ron and Laura
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people become self-sufficient and advance their economic status. We have been fortunate and have been blessed with a good life for which we are very thankful. We'd like to do our part in helping others achieve their hopes and dreams. Our grandson John Henry, age 10, has also started donating some of his money to Kiva- to people in need. He says he really doesn't need the money and he'd like to help people who really do need it.

lender.name: Mary and Victor
lender.loan_because: We care what happens to our world and all the people that live in it. We are proud grandparents of 9 beautiful grandchildren and we hope to show them by example that sharing and giving can be a very rewarding and enriching experience.
lender.occupational_info: We are a very happy retired couple that have been together for 36 years. We stay involved and active in protecting our world and keeping our imprint light.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to have someone help me when I started out. It's pay back time.
lender.occupational_info: Hands on holistic health care.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: We all need to help each other regardless of what part of the world we live in.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.occupational_info: I work in a medical helicopter that helps transport sick and injured people to hospitals.

lender.name: Dylan
lender.occupational_info: I'm still in high school so I go to school and study all day.

lender.name: Vistnes family
lender.loan_because: God had blessed us with more than we need!!

lender.name: Zac
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a brilliant way to empower those who may not otherwise have had the means to achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I help managers in the hiring of workers.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I can help someone who is working hard to improve her life. It is a loan, not a "handout," and enables people keep their dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I used to tutor children who were to ill to go to school. Working with people who try to better themselves, against all odds, is very rewarding. Women in emerging nations have difficult hurdles as they enter the business world, so my focus is on lending to them.

lender.name: Erika H
lender.loan_because: I want to create a beautiful world for my children and children everywhere. I love the fact that I can give to a mother across the planet and help her create a better life for her family.
lender.occupational_info: Mother, lover of life, nursing student, life student!

lender.name: Sonny
lender.loan_because: Everyone has a moral duty to help a fellow human being.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses find the best way to connect to their customers

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to start their own businesses, with the hope that they in turn will give aid to others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a home builder in the suburbs north of Chicago, Illinois USA. I build homes for sale and for clients.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others and that in my role as a teacher it is vitally important not just to talk about giving but also be an example of giving.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: It's an amazing feeling.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a construction and industrial supply company.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: A small loan can make a big difference.

lender.name: Karoline
lender.loan_because:
"I am only one, but I am one. I cannot do everything, but I can do something. And I will not let what I cannot do interfere with what I can do. " - Edward Everett Hale
I want to make a difference, and I think microfinance is a wonderful way to give individuals the opportunity to develop their full potential and take charge of their own destinies.
lender.occupational_info:
Some keywords to describe me and my life: Karoline. Female. 22. Norway. Jesus. Travelling. Concerts. Literature. Africa. Children. Iced coffee. Music. Movies. Clouds. History. Scarves. Languages. Fulham FC. Volunteering. Animals. Cello. Life. Faith. Hope. Love.
I am currently enrolled at University of Oslo and will receive my BA in development studies in the spring of 2012.
Last fall I studied peace and conflict studies in Pondicherry, India. This fall (2011), I will go to London and study abroad at School of Oriental and African Studies (SOAS).
I just can't see myself doing anything else than help other people. :)

lender.name: Amira
lender.loan_because: Such a small amount makes a huge difference and to help out an entrepreneur in developing countries is the least I can do. It makes me happy to help anyone in need.Been loaning since 2007 :o)
lender.occupational_info: My company plans events. The majority of our clients are weddings. We also do non-profit and charity events.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping less fortunate people
lender.occupational_info: buy older cars, fix up and repair and sell them

lender.name: Tina & Kim
lender.loan_because: We loan because it is one way that we can 'act globally" and because it might help make someone's life a little better...

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I want God's people to experience the power of his love and grace.
lender.occupational_info: God has blessed me with an opportunity to work in a small school community with underprivileged and minority children. I primarily teach them writing and math skills. However, I hope my students gain a confidence and motivation that encourages them to reach for the stars and achieve their dreams!

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference!

lender.name: Lana
lender.loan_because: "What we do for ourselves dies with us. What we do for others and the world remains and is immortal." - Albert Pine

lender.name: Zach & Jill
lender.loan_because: We love to travel and everywhere we visit we see the entrepreneurial spirit alive in locals who want to make a difference for their families & community, but often the resources aren't available to get their ideas off the ground.

lender.name: Bunny
lender.loan_because: I believe individual people can make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and journalist for magazines. I would like to write about micro loans and the people who have benefited from them.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: the governments of the developed world have failed to adequately redistribute the wealth they have accumulated.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a university studying the effects of global warming. Specifically, I am studying a subarctic wetland ecosystem.

lender.name: V. Kate
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed with the resources to do so.

lender.name: Jason&Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps!

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: everyone has something to give.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I am very grateful for the quality of my life and I am inspired to support someone who wants to put forth an effort to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired, working to build an organic health and healing community in western Oregon, living by example. I am working a community garden plot and live in a condo. Life is fantastic. Peace to you all.

lender.name: Miche
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone who has a dream, deserves the chance to achieve it.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: This is a good and easy way to give directly to people who are trying to improve their lives. It's just good karma.

lender.name: Lance
lender.loan_because: I want to help any way I can.

lender.name: Sai and Aarthi
lender.loan_because: We believe in teaching a man how to fish than give him a fish

lender.name: Karla
lender.loan_because: I want to give women the ability to support themselves and their families through their small business activities. Women around the world experience great difficulty accessing funds to start and expand small businesses; this is one small way I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a married mother of a sweet little girl named Heidi. I am an elected councilor on my local municipal government. My job is helping university students improve their study skills.

lender.name: Tom & Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea!

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help the working poor improve their lives around the world, not just locally.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to see by making lenses for eyewear.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do to make this world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I strive for cleaner and more efficient energy consumption and production through technology transfer and design / process / operation optimization.

lender.name: Marnie
lender.loan_because: I feel I live in the most wonderful country in the world and I want to help others have the opportunities that I have had for good work.
lender.occupational_info: Everything that is built needs to be drawn first for the builder or machinist. I make drawings on a computer for builders and machinists.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: it can change peoples' lives for the better. Plus, this website makes it pretty easy.

lender.name: John & Katherine
lender.loan_because: This loan is on behalf of the Richmond (Mass.) Congregational Church, which distributed "talents" to be used.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Nita
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I sell paper and make books for people to put their family memories into.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do, to help others
lender.occupational_info: I do research in mathematics and theoretical computer science

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I'm a loaner at heart.
lender.occupational_info: Walking by Faith, Working by Faith, Living by Faith, Giving in Faith.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: for a long time I have talked about wanting to help but have never really known how. This is so tangible and personal and I love the idea!
lender.occupational_info: I study nuclear medicine - it sounds more complicated than it really is :)

lender.name: Brad
lender.occupational_info: I design and improve websites, making them functional and easy to find at the same time. I also help people start their own businesses in reselling telecommunications services.

lender.name: Loretta
lender.loan_because: I desire to help positively change someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I help make sick people better.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: this is one of the the best things I can for the world do on the budget of a grad student.

lender.name: Jobie
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone a chance.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great opportunity to help others attain their dreams. For many this is a way out of poverty. I think it is important to give back whether it be this way or some other form of giving.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I want to help motivated people

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: "The time is always right to do what is right." -- Martin Luther King, Jr.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a video game company by day, and write/draw/design by night :)

lender.name: Kate and Rick
lender.loan_because: My wife Kate passed away in 2010 from Pancreatic Cancer. I am continuing her legacy of giving via this lending program. We both want to encourage small businesses around the world.

lender.name: Jenn
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: NuvoLogo
lender.loan_because: NuvoLogo is a small logo design company of four designers who all strive to create new opportunities for the world's poorest entrepreneurs to help pull them out of the cycle of poverty. We consider ourselves very fortunate to live in one of the world's richer countries. We know that it is our individual and company responsibility to help those who are working hard to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info:
We create logos and stationery for businesses looking to create a professional look for their company. We have worked for all sizes of businesses from Evelyn, a 68-year-old who knits to raise money for her grandchildren's college tuition, to large corporations with several hundred employees.
10% of all sales from all our projects are used to fund several micro-loans projects to help the working poor help themselves.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I think we are all put on this earth to serve others and especially those in the greatest need.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a public school district as a Food Service Director. I am in charge of 10 schools and feeding over 4000 students a healthy lunch each day. I love my work and the school community.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to give others an opportunity to live the comfortable life I'm currently living.

lender.name: C&P
lender.loan_because: we are the lucky ones.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves makes all kinds of sense.
lender.occupational_info: I write mystery novels under the name "Deborah Donnelly."

lender.name: Speakers' Spotlight
lender.loan_because: I believe it can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: We are an agency representing speakers who provide educational, inspiring and entertaining speeches at conferences, meetings and special events.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Capitalism works. Helping the disadvantaged to help themselves benefits the world.
lender.occupational_info: Jet engine design, analysis and testing

lender.name: H Lynn Watson
lender.loan_because:
"Of those to whom much is given, much is required" - JFK
Sharing abundance is a blessing in itself.
lender.occupational_info: I am an HIV testing counselor volunteer, and Manage a Salon and Spa

lender.name: Alain Desouches
lender.loan_because: I like the possibility of loaning directly to women entrepreneurs based on their projects, and knowing that my small contribution pulls them toward a more satisfying life.
lender.occupational_info: Now that I am retired, my most important work is to bring forth an environmentally sustainable, spiritually fulfilling and socially just human presence on this planet.

lender.name: Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: We can't just live our lives and not think of anyone else. We all should be helping other people in any way we can.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a reason not to.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I am not wealthy by US standards but still have so much more than most of the world. It feels good to help.

lender.name: Audrey
lender.loan_because: I'm selfish. Giving makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an administrative assistant for a local non-profit. I handle all the general office work and day-to-day tasks that keep the Association running, in addition to being the unofficial Volunteer Coordinator.

lender.name: Vilma
lender.loan_because: I feel that this is a way to thank God for everything that I have and everything that has been taken away from me that I didn't need.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of a blind person.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: being a woman is not easy and being a woman in business is even harder so if I can make it easier for one woman to make her dreams come true in business I will.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have a heating and air conditioning business. We also do geo thermla heating and cooling which use the ground, air or water as a source of heating and cooling with no green house gas emissions.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: It's such a simple and effective way to make a difference to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital to help people recover from illness or surgery

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: It feels good to know I'm helping someone.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I want to help others be independent
lender.occupational_info: Bringing world peace through world trade.

lender.name: Dexter
lender.loan_because: I have lived and worked in Malaysia, Nigeria, Columbia and many other countries. The world is small and we all share the same dream to improve our lives and offer our children a better future. All we need is the means by which to achieve the ends. My hats off to Kiva for being a vehicle for positive, peaceful change in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I improve business operations for companies around the world.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I learned about Kiva from one of Oprah's shows. I thought it was a wonderful way of having a positive impact on someone's life less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I am on operating room nurse in a busy outpatient surgery facility. I specialize in the field of retinal surgery.

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because: I can. I don't have much, but it's enough.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Lee Kyle
lender.occupation: Sales Manager - Cable TV, Internet and Phone
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed and want to share my good fortune. Giving back is important to me.

lender.name: Edward & Waltraud
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping those who have a sincere desire to better living conditions for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Jeff and Trina
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance!
lender.occupational_info: General Contractor of Custom Homes and Developer of property.

lender.name: Ashleigh
lender.loan_because: "no one has ever become poor from giving" - anne frank

lender.name: Francisco
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO GIVE PEOPLE A CHANCE TO BETTER THEIR LIVES.
lender.occupational_info: I'M INVOLVE IN THE MAINTENANCE AND IMPROVEMENT OF COMMERCIAL BUILDINGS

lender.name: Geraldine
lender.loan_because: I Love To Help People Anyway I Can!
lender.occupational_info: I Drive a School Bus :) I Love Children!! ;)

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I saw this on Oprah and thought it was a great way to help people, especially when they can start a business. This must be a great feeling for the families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a plumbing business, I price the work done, invoice, answer the phone,(when it is winter everyones furnace quits!) I also do payroll and pay bills.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with other people.
lender.occupational_info: I paint pictures of the beautiful land in the area where I live. I also design electronics for Keyspan. You can see their products at www.Keyspan.com.

lender.name: JOhn
lender.loan_because: I feel that every person deserves a chance in life, and having the ability to change their life is an amazing feeling.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: it's better to give than receive

lender.name: Mike V
lender.loan_because: I believe this is disruptive technology, in the way that we can so easily directly help others in developing countries. It has the potential to make an enormous impact, and is also a very cool idea! I try to stick to countries we've visited, as a way of giving back - but I'm open to others, if there's a business or story that catches my interest. For me it's all about empowering people to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: everyone should have a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: small business partner in internet technology company

lender.name: Branndon
lender.loan_because: God helped me when I was in need, to give my family a better life, so now its my turn to give back
lender.occupational_info: I renivate power plants and refiners to run cleaner and more effecient

lender.name: Kwenu
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help someone who is actively trying to help themselves, but may be just short of funds!
lender.occupational_info: I am an Sign language Interpreter. I faclliate communication between Deaf and Hearing indivduals.

lender.name: Ron & Chris
lender.loan_because: we came from lower income families and appreciate the help we received to get where we are today. Just paying forward!

lender.name: Sarinee
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Roland
lender.loan_because: I believe that in most circumstances people will do best with a helping hand that goes beyond a handout. I am a native of Guatemala and would like to invest in its future.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Director of a program that provides multi-million dollar grants to community-based clinics in Los Angeles, California

lender.name: Ken & Rosemary
lender.loan_because: It parallels the example of teaching one to catch fish - rather than just giving them fish.
lender.occupational_info: I design and manufacture signage and recognition awards for businesses and non profit organizations. Non electrical to neon

lender.name: Danielle and Derek
lender.loan_because: My husband I are young but we've grown up with the lesson of generosity and the gift of giving. We love this idea of being able to help a specific person in such a huge way and to see where our money is going and watching this person succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work in logistics for the United States Navy Supply Department. My husband is an Avionics Electrician for the United States Navy.

lender.name: yahya
lender.loan_because: Giving back is an important part of who I am. As citizens of the world it is our duty to help our bretherens accross the globe.
lender.occupational_info: Traveling the world trying to connect people in remote locations.

lender.name: Maha
lender.loan_because: Simply: I put myself in their shoes.

lender.name: christine
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to have lived out many of my dreams. I feel it is my turn to give back and help others work towards their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a very large group of creative people in the sales industry.

lender.name: Netfreez
lender.loan_because: We would like to assist in funding new and prospective entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Netfreez is an online retail store serving consumers and business.

lender.name: Kaiwa
lender.loan_because: Helping others Helps me cope with the day to day challenges of Life.
lender.occupational_info: I was forced into retirement from an oil company, due to severe health problems. The times I have that I can work I design and craft custom wood furniture. Great therapy and challenge for a crippled man.

lender.name: Pollyanna
lender.loan_because: This is the first time i have been on the site and i am very excited about helping Ana Maria realise her business goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people within corporations helping them become more self aware, clearer about what they want and suport them to achieve what they want to achieve.

lender.name: denise
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: SV-Eberhard
lender.loan_because: We want that the attendance of schools becomes possible.
lender.occupational_info: We are students

lender.name: Tineke
lender.loan_because: I was looking for a way to share what I have plenty of in according to the entrepreneurs all over the world. It's such an easy way to support someone, that it is almost ashaming. But it works! I am looking forward to see ''my businesses'' succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I work with people with a minor mentally handicap, that live on there own. I support them to find their way in a world that is sometimes very confusing.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: I care!

lender.name: Long Tail Lenders
lender.loan_because: ...we all want to make the world a better place & microcredit is a great way to see the direct results of your own contribution...it's all about teaching people to fish & fend for themselves!!! ...and it's also good food for the soul!!!!
lender.occupational_info: Long Tail Lenders are a group of friends that have one thing in common: we all want to help people in less fortunate positions than we are to be able to help themselves - free from aid or handouts!

lender.name: hoks
lender.loan_because: We have so much to be thankful for. I hope we can be a positive change for someone who needs a little boost.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of two precious boys. I work as a PT to help rehabilitate people who have lost function or mobility due to illness or injury.

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: Helping women make their world a better place, helps me to make mine a better one.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: i am employed by the government to teach young adults about graphic design - making web sites and brochures and posters, so that they can get a good job doing interesting work. The main tool for this job is the computer.

lender.name: Jacques
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-finance.

lender.name: Louise F. Nielsen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, so they can make a succesfull business.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I really believe that giving one person or small group a hand up we help them, their families and their community

lender.name: www.annarchy.com
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: entrepreneur

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I write software programs and test code written by others.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: My children and I have been through some very rough times. Through it all they remained wonderful, positive industrious teens who value education. I welcome the opportunity to help some other young person achieve their similar goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Hospitality/Tourism industriy in one of the World's premier tourism destinations.

lender.name: Cedric
lender.loan_because: I feel I have a debt to persons who have been less fortunate in life than myself.
lender.occupational_info: Now retired, I was in the field of advertising, While charities help to alleviate suffering, just giving to the dispossessed does not help to return pride to them, nor even necessarily diminish the resentment they feel that can push them into more desperate ways like terrorism, for instance. It is my hope and belief that by helping them instead to pull themselves out of misery, we can help them not to need to rely on demeening hand outs and thus stand tall again and rejoin the world community as happy citizens.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I can.Even if it's just a small amount,I think it is my duty to help my fellow human beings. I can't pretend all is right with the world because I was fortunate to be born in a nation that has a lot of wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I verify that the phone company's customers have their correct address loaded into the emergency database should they ever need police, fire truck or an ambulance.

lender.name: Rp en Nannette
lender.loan_because: We respect people who want to work themselves out of poverty. We believe in the Kiva concept to make a difference this way.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving back to people in need. Not just in this country, but around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I own a retail sporting goods store.

lender.name: JoAnn
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping those that need a hand, not a handout!!

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I am so grateful for all the love and support I have had from my family and friends which has given me opportunities for education, career advancement and personal development. This is a way for me to extend their gifts to the world.

lender.name: Rivka
lender.loan_because: we are so blessed to have so much. The cost of our Lattes and lunch for the week can feed an entire family for a month.

lender.name: Mala
lender.loan_because: We all have the same goals in life - to provide the best for those we love. This program gives people a chance to do just that with our helping hand.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Sometimes people just need a break. I was given one recently and want to help pay it forward little by little.

lender.name: LEAT & JOEY
lender.loan_because: we love to give, its the best feeling in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Leat is a registered nurse (RN) she takes care of sick people in the hospital... she assesses how well the are doing and gives them their medications. Joey is a business owner.. he ownes cell phone stores in New York

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Kiva loans seem to help people much more than charity ever did. I do not intend to take any money out of this organization. So, in many ways, it mostly replaces my charity money.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in the stock market to earn dividends to live on.

lender.name: Yps
lender.loan_because: It gives me that warm fuzzy feeling.

lender.name: DUVAL
lender.loan_because:
We are all one family on a tiny planet amongst billions of others in the Universe. Why not make our home the very best it can be?
Micro-loans are one way to help others find their passion and to take care of themselves and their families. It works.
I just loaned for the 142nd time on Kiva.org and am grateful for the opportunity to do so.
Member since:

lender.name: Adeel
lender.loan_because: it's fun!

lender.name: Roald
lender.loan_because: We are on the world to help each other and because I'm able to help others it's my duty to do so. The entrepreneurs in developing countries are very important to make progress in the overall living standard of people. Next to that it is important for the emancipation that women are able to set up their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I"m the People Relations Manager for IKEA Netherlands.

lender.name: Tim & Hazzel
lender.loan_because: I love helping people. It feels good to be able to make a difference in someone's life with so little.
lender.occupational_info: It is a real honor and a blessing to work in the Jacksonville Public Libray. I help people with resumes, job search, family research, school work, etc.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I am a salesman for futureguard/NuImage awnings, we sell motorized retractable awnings to homes and business'

lender.name: ELREPCO
lender.loan_because: Jesus said "when you fed them, you fed me. " "When you visited me in jail, you visited me. " We are loved by God. We all deserve a shot at making a living and living without poverty or hunger.
lender.occupational_info: I run a company that works with major and start up electronic companies to make their product better.

lender.name: Alida
lender.loan_because: I dig it.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I think it's interesting and fun, and it's a good way to help people in other parts of the world
lender.occupational_info: I am a 6th grader studying pre-engineering at a magnet school
